titles.title: A bill to provide for the application of a 6-year statute of limitations to certain claims filed by Federal employees under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 (29 U.S.C. 201 et seq.).

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8400)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/1/1994--Introduced. Directs the Comptroller General to apply a six-year statute of limitations to certain claims filed by Federal employees under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938.
